body_html: @adarob , thanks for responding! I need to meet a deadline this Sunday for my internship project, but I have another month after that to continue working on the project. Could I email you directly for help with hacking a solution in the short term? (I'm happy to talk here, but I know TensorFlow developers like to keep conversations focused on the original issue).
